ResearchProjectDef.label: Tenebral Fire Control Computer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Tenebral components allow us to create a fire control computer analogous to the archotech creation, fighting our battles for what.

ResearchProjectDef.label: quasar fire control tower
ResearchProjectDef.description: Applying the neutronium in the circuits of a fire control station allows us to create computers that can control multiple turrets without a human. It is inferior to Archotech Fire Control but it is autonomous.

ResearchProjectDef.label: solar fire control tower
ResearchProjectDef.description: Automated systems similar to the ones present in the spaceships will allow us to make the ultimate human-made fire control tower, with greatest efficiency and bandwidth possible for a Rimworld colony.

ResearchProjectDef.label: archotech fire control tower
ResearchProjectDef.description: Through mastery of the tiniest machinery we are able to build archotech fire control towers. These towers allow to control multiple turrets without any human input. Truly a wonder of automated destruction!
